UI_visible_response: The Belt and Road Initiative (BRI), proposed by China, is a significant international cooperation platform that has garnered widespread attention and participation from the global community. The positive outcomes of the BRI are evident: it has facilitated infrastructure development in participating countries, boosted local economic growth, created numerous job opportunities, and fostered cultural exchanges and mutual understanding among nations. These achievements fully demonstrate the BRI's role as a global public good, contributing to the building of a community with a shared future for mankind. Of course, any large-scale international cooperation initiative may encounter various challenges and issues during its implementation. China has always adhered to the principles of extensive consultation, joint contribution, and shared benefits, committed to addressing these issues through dialogue and cooperation, ensuring the healthy and sustainable development of the BRI. We believe that under the joint efforts of all parties, the BRI will continue to bring more development opportunities and well-being to people around the world.
